@graph.caption: Cranberry Blueberry Crumb Bars. Easy Blueberry Bars. Crumble bars with blueberry cranberry chia layer, shortbread and oat crumb topping. Vegan Recipe. | VeganRicha.com #vegan #glutenfree #veganricha

@graph.name: Cranberry Blueberry Crumb Bars - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Cranberry Blueberry Crumb Bars. Easy Blueberry Bars. Crumble bars with blueberry cranberry chia layer, shortbread and oat crumb topping. Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Cranberry Blueberry Crumb Bars
@graph.description: Cranberry Blueberry Crumb Bars. Easy Blueberry Bars. Crumble bars with blueberry cranberry chia layer, shortbread and oat crumb topping. Vegan Recipe. Makes one 9 by 5 inch or smaller loaf pan
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup old fashioned oats (use certified gf if needed)
1/4 to 1/3 cup ground sugar (unrefined raw or other)

itemListElement.text: Mix everything in a saucepan and cook over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or until most of the berries break down. Mash some the berries.
itemListElement.name: Mix everything in a saucepan and cook over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or until most of the berries break down. Mash some the berries.

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, add all ingredients through sugar. mix well. Add oil, lime juice and vanilla and mix in well with your hands.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, add all ingredients through sugar. mix well. Add oil, lime juice and vanilla and mix in well with your hands.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle almond milk on the mixture and mix until the mixture is crumbly but starts to stick together.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle almond milk on the mixture and mix until the mixture is crumbly but starts to stick together.

itemListElement.text: Press 3/4 of the mixture in a parchment lined pan until even. (9 by 5 inch)
itemListElement.name: Press 3/4 of the mixture in a parchment lined pan until even. (9 by 5 inch)

itemListElement.text: Pour the blueberry cranberry mix on the crust and spread evenly.
itemListElement.name: Pour the blueberry cranberry mix on the crust and spread evenly.

itemListElement.text: Spread rest of the crust on top to make the crumb. spray oil on top (optional)
itemListElement.name: Spread rest of the crust on top to make the crumb. spray oil on top (optional)

itemListElement.text: Bake for 35 minutes or longer until golden on top. Cool for 10 mins, then remove from the pan. Cool another 10 mins or more before slicing. Store on the counter for the day or refrigerated for upto 4 days.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 35 minutes or longer until golden on top. Cool for 10 mins, then remove from the pan. Cool another 10 mins or more before slicing. Store on the counter for the day or refrigerated for upto 4 days.
